function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Percepción negativa del teletrabajo","Impact":"Menor eficiencia y menor compromiso institucional","Mitigation":"Implementar programas de capacitación y concientización sobre los beneficios del teletrabajo","Technologies":"E-learning platforms, virtual communication tools","People":"Employees, organizations","Owner":"Human resources departments, organizational leaders"},{"Description":"Aislamiento social de los teletrabajadores","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health and well-being","Mitigation":"Promote and support social connections through virtual meetings and team-building activities","Technologies":"Virtual communication tools, collaboration platforms","People":"Telecommuters, organizations","Owner":"Human resources departments, team leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of legal framework for telecommuting","Impact":"Unsafe and unfair working conditions for telecommuters","Mitigation":"Advocate for the development and enforcement of telecommuting laws and regulations","Technologies":"Online advocacy platforms, digital petition tools","People":"Telecommuters, labor unions, lawmakers","Owner":"Labor unions, advocacy groups"}]}
